body.name: Mr. Coffee Coffee Maker, Programmable Coffee Machine with Auto Pause and Glass Carafe, 5 Cups, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 5 mins
features: Please refer to user guide or user manual or user guide (provided below in PDF) before first use
Compact design that fits nicely into small spaces
Brew later feature allows you to set your coffeemaker ahead and wake up to fresh brewed coffee
Ergonomic carafe designed for easy pouring and handling with ounces markings for better measuring
body.description: Enjoy great coffee simply made with the Mr. Coffee® 5-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker. It makes up to 25 oz. of coffee, just right for two 12 oz. cups, and the compact design fits nicely into small spaces. The updated, ergonomic carafe design with ounce markings takes the guesswork out of measuring. Brew Now or Later options to allow you to set brewing ahead of time and wake up to freshly brewed coffee, and Grab-A-Cup Auto Pause allows you to stop the brewing cycle to pour a cup, then continue brewing until complete. After 2 hours, the coffee maker will automatically shut off. All you need to do is sit back, sip, and enjoy! Also includes a water filtration system and a reusable nylon filter.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Just the Right Size Brews the perfect amount for two 12-oz. cups. Plus, this coffee maker is just right for small spaces. Easy to Use Ounce markings make measuring a snap. 2-hour auto-shutoff gives you peace of mind. Brew Now or Brew Later The Brew Later feature lets you set the coffee maker ahead —wake up to a fresh, delicious cup.
Includes a Mr. Coffee Water Filtration disk and frame for better-tasting coffee; the red tab on the disk frame lets you know when it’s time to change the water filter

More Great Features Includes reusable coffee filterGrab-a-Cup Auto Pause lets you pour a cup before the brewing cycle endsEasy-view Water Window helps prevent overflowLift & Clean Filter Basket is dishwasher safe for easy cleanupErgonomic carafe for easy pouring and handling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best home brewed coffee I've had in years!
reviews.reviewText: I got this after giving away a Braun 12 cup auto drip pot. As empty nesters, I didn't have the need for such a large capacity pot, especially since DH is not a coffee drinker!Pros: Easy to operate and clean. Has a convenient Brew Later feature for folks who want to wake up to the aroma of fresh coffee. Very small footprint so it doesn't take up a lot of precious counter space. Stay warm plate delivers a perfect temperature second cup. Oh and did I mention, it makes a most excellent home brewed cup of coffee!Cons: I did see this issue listed in a few reviews and I have experienced it also...the coffee in the brew basket does not drain into the pot as quickly as the water is pumped onto the grounds. This causes the grounds to overflow and land in the carafe. I get around this by turning of the machine for a minute or so to allow the basket to drain. I then start the brew again to finish and get no grounds in my pot.I highly recommend this tiny pot especially for one person households, good value all around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Update: the carafe leaks at the mouth when pouring coffee into my cup.My 5 cup Mr. Coffee coffee maker came today and I am having my 1st cup right now. It's delicious. I love the compact size of this machine. I pour water into the reservoir with my left hand, so being able to see the level of the water inside the reservoir on my right hand side of the machine is wonderful. It's easy to set the time and program the time to come on in the morning. After hearing that the larger filters don't fit, I ordered smaller ones which are readily available on Amazon. The 4 to 6 cup size filters work perfectly. I don't use the reusable basket at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Basic and simple to use
reviews.reviewText: Got this to replace the Black & Decker which replaced my original Mr. Coffee 4-cupper when the glass carafe cracked. The Black & Decker stopped working all of a sudden - I was trying to clean it and the toggling power button fell out. I couldn't figure out how to fix it, so I was looking for a simple "double-action" push-button power switch, and found this model.Has been working pretty well. It came with a re-usable filter basket (haven't used it because I prefer using paper filters to avoid the hassle of cleaning the coffee stain) and a water filter (don't need the extra gimmick since I already have counter-top water filters).A few minor "odd" details: the water level of the reservoir is not readily discernible, have to use the glass carafe with the "cup" markings to fill water; the "drain hole" of the filter holder is off-centered because the carafe is wider (compared to my original Mr. Coffee); and the standard size paper filters are a tad too large for the filter holder so I have to make sure it is seated snugly - it was making a mess regularly before I realized what was happening - the paper filter was riding high but the weight of the coffee granules was not enough to push the filter down, so when the hot water starts dripping, the paper filter "collapsed" and the coffee grounds got around and over the paper filter, and into my coffee!Would have preferred my original Mr. Coffee, but the cost of the replacement glass carafe is almost as much as the entire coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: I am the only coffee drinker in the house. I had an old Mr. Coffee machine with a thermal carafe that was upwards of 15 years old that this replaced. Love the small size- I can make about 1/2 a pot and that's plenty of coffee for me (I only drink ~2 cups per day). Like that it came with the reusable filter but it does let some grounds into the coffee. I have been using paper filters easily available on Amazon or your local Walmart. I also like the programmable function of this coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Mr Coffee has never failed me, I had the $10 one for about 12 years, but the plastic on top which keeps in the steam finally warped enough to cause issues. This is the upgraded version with the possibility of a brew later and 5 cups instead of my old 4.Love the "Brew Later". Set the current time, press brew later and it asks to set what time you want it to brew. Wait about 3 seconds, time stops blinking, good to go. Also it remembers the time, so when you press brew later another day, the last entered time blinks for a few seconds then takes if you don't press anything. I also like that the brew later has to be pressed. I was worried it might try to brew every day automatically, and that is not the case. Maybe none do that, but I was worried.Like my old Mr Coffee, reusable filter so no waste there, simple to clean, markings on the side water fill area match the liquid level in the pot after brewing (my old one was off by almost a cup by the end there, this one is accurate).Very happy! Gret price! Can't possibly be easier to use. Thank you Mr Coffee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple drip coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: I was using a Mr. Coffee for several years and it stopped working. This is the newer version, I think, and I love the additional feature of setting it up the night before with a very easy to use timer. I think it makes great coffee. Nothing fancy, and very inexpensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works great just randomly shuts off
reviews.reviewText: I bought this coffee maker jan 2022. It's worked great. My only complaints are it starts brewing and then shuts off and I only notice it when I go to get my coffee and there's only 1c when I poured 4 cups. 2nd complaint it will turn off right after brewing so I have to turn it back on so my husband can have hot coffee when he wakes up. It sometimes turns off before the 2 hour shutoff. My last issue is in order to get 4 cups of coffee I have to fill the carafe to 5 cups line. If I don't fill it to almost 5 and only to 4 I'll get 3 cups of coffee. Other than those 3 things it works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The coffee maker itself works just fine, but it is definitely made for right handed people. As a leftie I can’t see the marks on the pot as I fill it. The basket is removed in a way that’s awkward with the left hand. The lid opens to the left and is a little bit in my way.But if you, like me, are used to being a left handed person in a right handed world, then it’s fine. Juuuust fine.

Apenas la probé el día de ayer 02/05/2023 y es super fácil y practica, la compre para tenerla en la oficina justo en mi escritorio :)Voy a usarla 6 días a la semana vamos a ver que tal funciona y seguiré comentando en el proceso, como dato importante el filtro de agua que es la el que se pone arriba del filtro del café, se tiene que cambiar 1 vez por mes o bien cuando cuentes 30 filtraciones, esto optimiza el uso y mantiene libre los minerales del agua al mecanismo de nuestra cafetera; espero les sirva mi comentario!! :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Très bonne cafetière pour ceux et celle qui habite en appartement
reviews.reviewText: Meilleur cafetière que J ai eu ! Assurer vous de bien nettoyer la machineQuand j ai ouvert la boîte, j ai nettoyer la machine et j ai commencé à infuser du café et la première tasse que j ai fais , j ai vue un petit insecte. J ai du jeté la première tasse et j ai relaver la cafetière

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Terrible from the listing to the product
reviews.reviewText: The seller is listed from UK and said item delivered from the UK however is actually delivered from USA So had to also buy and adopter.Used twice and broke. Set it up to brew in the morning woke up to only half a cup. Cleaned everything and tried again but just wouldn’t work.Seller tried to get ME TO PAY to send it back to USA. however after a few emails back and forth the did issue a full refund but didn’t arrange for the item to be collect so it’s now binned.
funciona muy bien y muy rápida

J’aime beaucoup la machine à café que j’ai reçu là première j’ai commandé une deuxième machine je l’ai jamais reçu j’aimerais bien la recevoir il mon remi mon argent mais j’aimerais mieux avoir la machine à cafés
